rootkeys.bootpass.en:
Password request
Device unlock
Security: Low
Tip: a convenience PIN is OK.
rootkeys.bootpass.zh:
输入密码
解锁
安全含义:低

rootkeys.updatepass.en:
Password request
Software update key
Security: Critical
Tip: use a phrase instead of a word.
rootkeys.updatepass.zh:
输入密码
软件更新
安全含义:至关重要
rootkeys.updatepass.en-audio: Enter update password. This password is critically important.

rootkeys.setup.en:
This will init the root keys.
I'm going to need two
passwords:
 1. Device unlock
 2. Software update
rootkeys.setup.zh:
这将初始化根密钥
需要两个密码
1.解锁
2.软件更新
rootkeys.setup.en-audio: This will initialize the root keys. We're going to need two passwords, one for device unlock, and one for software updates.

rootkeys.setup_wait.en:
Initializing keys.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.setup_wait.zh:
现在正在初始化
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.setup_wait.en-audio: Initializing keys. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.signing_loader.en:
Signing loader.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.signing_loader.zh:
签名引导程序
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.signing_loader.en-audio: Signing loader. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.signing_kernel.en:
Signing kernel.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.signing_kernel.zh:
签名内核
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.signing_kernel.en-audio: Signing kernel. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.backup_gateware.en:
Backing up gateware.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.backup_gateware.zh:
备份比特流
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.backup_gateware.en-audio: Backing up gateware. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.patching_keys.en:
Injecting new keys.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.patching_keys.zh:
更换新钥匙
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.patching_keys.en-audio: Injecting new keys. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.verifying_gateware.en:
Verifying gateware.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.verifying_gateware.zh:
验证比特流
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.verifying_gateware.en-audio: Verifying gateware. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.

rootkeys.init.commit_signatures.en:
Committing signatures.
This takes a few minutes.
Do not reset or sleep!
rootkeys.init.commit_signatures.zh:
保存签名
可能还要等一下
不要重置或睡眠!
rootkeys.init.commit_signatures.en-audio: Committing signatures. This may take a while, don't reset or sleep the device.
